q: Mr Alassane Ouattara in a temporary headquarters at a hotel in the main city of Abidjan. Prime Minister Raila Odinga of Kenya has told the BBC his latest mediation efforts to end the crisis have failed. Unfortunately President Gbagbo has once again refused to lift the blockade around the Golf Hotel in Abidjan where Mr Alassane Ouattara was staying- that made it impossible for negotiations to take place, Mr Raila Odinga told the BBC.`` We... have told Mr Gbagbo that time is running out for peaceful negotiations,'' he said.
